This site stores cookies on your device according to our WE SPECIALIZE IN APPLIED RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT OF SOFTWARE PRODUCTS IN THE FIELD OF COMPUTER VISION AND VIDEO ANALYTICS OUR SOLUTIONS ARE USED IN SECURITY SYSTEMS, MANAGEMENT OF TRANSPORTATION INFRASTRUCTURE, RETAIL AND OTHER AREAS OF PEOPLE'S DAILY ACTIVITIES TEACHING AI TO SEE IMPORTANT THINGS Scientific approach to business The company was founded by the staff of the Laboratory of Computer Graphics and Multimedia of Faculty of Computational Mathematics and Cybernetics of Lomonosov Moscow State University. In our work we are guided by a scientific approach and the right to experiment as the main principle of our activity. We invite employees who share our values and are interested in exploring the world around us. Solving complex business problems The basis of our staff are graduates of Moscow State University, Higher School of Economics, Skoltech. Highly qualified specialists are able to solve the most complex tasks, which require non‑standard approaches and deep understanding of algorithms of Artificial Intelligence‑based solutions. Ethics and partnership approach We see ourselves as an equal team of visionaries and innovators who develop cutting‑edge AI solutions. Without trial and error, new discoveries and achievements are impossible. Therefore, we welcome creativity in our employees and encourage new ideas, even if they will bring tangible results not right now, but in the future. Our work is based on ethics and respect for people. We know that our designs and solutions improve people's lives, help them in their daily lives and prevent negative phenomena. This is only possible with total respect for our employees, for the commercial secrets of our clients and for the personal data of others. OUR SOLUTIONS SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASE OPERATIONAL EFFICIENCY AND IMPROVE CUSTOMER SERVICE IN VARIOUS COMPANIES WORLDWIDE: WE IMPROVE OUR EXPERTISE BY PARTNERSHIP WITH LEADING SOFTWARE VENDORS, INTEGRATORS AND COMPANIES IN FINANCE, RETAIL AND MANUFACTURING INDUSTRIES WE ARE OPEN TO DISCUSS CUSTOM COMPUTER VISION ALGORITHMS DEVELOPMENT
